author: jstrachan
msg: Refactored code in SQL tags a little bit to share code across the query and update tags.
We could now add smartQuery and smartUpdate tags that allow <param> tags to denote where a ? should be, to make it easier to line up params with '?'
update foo set a = <sql:param value="${foo}"/> where b = <sql:param value="${bar}"/>

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the Ant tag library to use the new ConvertingWrapDynaBean just added to beanutils for wrapping a bean but also providing type conversions (unlike WrapDynaBean which does no conversion)

author: jstrachan
msg: Re-added missing test script that seemed to get accidentally deleted yesterday.
